funding-source.named-content: The Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey

funding-group.funding-statement: This study was supported by the Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey with the project titled ‘The development of a rapid diagnostic kit using the immunochromatographic method of depending on an M2e peptide-specific IgY antibody for the diagnosis of influenza A infection’ (Project No: 115S132); The Scientific and Technological Research Council of Turkey [115S132].
